data.markdown:
## Description The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name in bold, uppercase letters. The text "KÄRCHER" is centered and displayed in black font. The background is a bright yellow rectangle, which makes the text stand out prominently. Below the brand name, there is a thin black line that spans the width of the yellow rectangle. The overall design is simple yet distinctive, emphasizing the brand's identity. ## K 3 CLASSIC CAR Überzeugt besonders bei leichteren Verschmutzungen: Der kompakte und platzsparende Hochdruckreiniger K 3 Classic Car mit Teleskopgriff überzeugt bei Reinigungsarbeiten rund ums Auto. ## Bestell-Nr. 1.676-222.0 - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529057341
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPA 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4.2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6.9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450
## Ausstattung
Car Kit Waschbürste, Schaumdüse, Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo, 0.5 l
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image displays a yellow pressure washer with several accessories. The main unit is compact and has a handle on top for easy portability. It features a hose coiled around the front, with a nozzle attachment point at the bottom. The unit is mounted on two wheels for mobility. ### Accessories Included: 1. **Pressure Washer Gun**: A handheld spray gun with a trigger, designed for directing the water flow. 2. **Two Spray Lances**: - One lance appears to be a standard spray lance for general cleaning. - The other is likely a dirt blaster lance, which is typically used for more intensive cleaning tasks. 3. **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, presumably designed to be used with the pressure washer for enhanced cleaning performance. 4. **Rotary Brush**: A brush attachment with bristles, useful for scrubbing surfaces while washing. 5. **Adapter**: A small connector piece, likely used to attach various accessories to the main unit. The pressure washer is branded with a logo on the top front, indicating the manufacturer. The overall design suggests it is intended for home use, suitable for cleaning cars, patios, and other outdoor surfaces. ## Description The image is a logo representing a "Guinness World Records" emblem. It features a circular design with a blue outer ring and a white inner circle. The text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" is prominently displayed in white on the blue ring. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon. Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, uppercase letters. This section is colored in gold, giving it a prestigious appearance. The overall design conveys a sense of achievement and recognition, typically associated with setting or holding a world record. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, there is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads: **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHIC DESIGNER BRAND** This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance graphic design industry. The use of bold and contrasting colors emphasizes the importance and confidence of the statement. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular shape. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is written. The flag is positioned with the black stripe on top, the red stripe in the middle, and the yellow stripe at the bottom, forming a downward-pointing arrow shape. The text is centered beneath the flag design. This logo indicates that the product or item is manufactured in Germany. ### Description The image is a symbol or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a power plug and an electrical bolt, suggesting a theme related to electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design is simple and uses high contrast to emphasize the message of increased power or efficiency. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown spraying water onto a surface, represented by a horizontal line. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating the ability to increase or vary the power of the spray. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to adjust the intensity of the water spray. ## Description of the Figure The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains the text "Im Lieferumfang enthalten." This phrase is in German and translates to "Included in the delivery" in English. There are no additional visual elements, such as checkboxes, charts, or diagrams, present in this crop. The text is straightforward and does not include any formatting or additional context.

## Description

The image is a logo for the brand "Kärcher." It features the brand name in bold, uppercase letters. The text "KÄRCHER" is centered and displayed in black font. The background is a bright yellow rectangle, which makes the text stand out prominently. Below the brand name, there is a thin black line that spans the width of the yellow rectangle. The overall design is simple yet distinctive, emphasizing the brand's identity.

## K 3 CLASSIC CAR

Überzeugt besonders bei leichteren Verschmutzungen: Der kompakte und platzsparende Hochdruckreiniger K 3 Classic Car mit Teleskopgriff überzeugt bei Reinigungsarbeiten rund ums Auto.

## Bestell-Nr.

1.676-222.0

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4066529057341
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPA 20 - max. 120 / 2 - max. 12
Fördermenge l/h 380
Flächenleistung m²/h 25
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.6
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4.2
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6.9
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450

## Ausstattung
Car Kit Waschbürste, Schaumdüse, Reinigungsmittel Autoshampoo, 0.5 l
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image displays a yellow pressure washer with several accessories. The main unit is compact and has a handle on top for easy portability. It features a hose coiled around the front, with a nozzle attachment point at the bottom. The unit is mounted on two wheels for mobility.

### Accessories Included:

1. **Pressure Washer Gun**: A handheld spray gun with a trigger, designed for directing the water flow.

2. **Two Spray Lances**: 
   - One lance appears to be a standard spray lance for general cleaning.
   - The other is likely a dirt blaster lance, which is typically used for more intensive cleaning tasks.

3. **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, presumably designed to be used with the pressure washer for enhanced cleaning performance.

4. **Rotary Brush**: A brush attachment with bristles, useful for scrubbing surfaces while washing.

5. **Adapter**: A small connector piece, likely used to attach various accessories to the main unit.

The pressure washer is branded with a logo on the top front, indicating the manufacturer. The overall design suggests it is intended for home use, suitable for cleaning cars, patios, and other outdoor surfaces.

## Description

The image is a logo representing a "Guinness World Records" emblem. It features a circular design with a blue outer ring and a white inner circle. The text "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" is prominently displayed in white on the blue ring. In the center, there is a stylized trophy or cup icon.

Below the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, uppercase letters. This section is colored in gold, giving it a prestigious appearance.

The overall design conveys a sense of achievement and recognition, typically associated with setting or holding a world record.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, there is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. Inside the arrow, the text reads:

**WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE GRAPHIC DESIGNER BRAND**

This suggests a claim of being the top brand in the freelance graphic design industry. The use of bold and contrasting colors emphasizes the importance and confidence of the statement.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag, which are black, red, and yellow, arranged in a stylized, angular shape. Below the flag design, the text "Made in Germany" is written. The flag is positioned with the black stripe on top, the red stripe in the middle, and the yellow stripe at the bottom, forming a downward-pointing arrow shape. The text is centered beneath the flag design. This logo indicates that the product or item is manufactured in Germany.

### Description

The image is a symbol or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a power plug and an electrical bolt, suggesting a theme related to electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. The design is simple and uses high contrast to emphasize the message of increased power or efficiency.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown spraying water onto a surface, represented by a horizontal line. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating the ability to increase or vary the power of the spray. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature of a pressure washer that allows the user to adjust the intensity of the water spray.

## Description of the Figure

The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains the text "Im Lieferumfang enthalten." This phrase is in German and translates to "Included in the delivery" in English. There are no additional visual elements, such as checkboxes, charts, or diagrams, present in this crop. The text is straightforward and does not include any formatting or additional context.
